title: Just Admit It, Obama | Guests: Bill O’Reilly & Katrina Pierson | 6/10/21
description:
Glenn retracts his apology for once calling former president Obama a racist, given his support for critical race theory. Glenn challenges Obama to be courageous and finally admit he’s a Marxist. It’s time to cut Burger King out of your life. The United States will be gifted a second Statue of Liberty. Texas state Rep. Tan Parker joins to explain why the Left should actually read the new pro-patriotic education “1836 Project” before criticizing it. Bill O’Reilly joins a day early to discuss his upcoming history tour with former President Trump. A New York mom’s powerful rebuke of her school board has gone viral. 2016 Trump campaign spokesperson Katrina Pierson breaks down the media’s double standard on Hunter Biden.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
